channel.title: Pi error
channel.description:
Hey, guys this error is in my CastleWars.java, it's saying I need to add a public static thing for stuff, but either I added it wrong or that didn't work, any help? Here's my error.
src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:99: non-static variable playerHat can not be referenced from a static context } else if (player.playerEquipment[Player.playerHat] > 0 || playe r.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:99: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.minigames.CastleWars } else if (player.playerEquipment[Player.playerHat] > 0 || playe r.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:208: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipment[Player.playerWeapon] = -1; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:209: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipmentN[Player.playerWeapon] = 0; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:240: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context if (player.playerEquipment[Player.playerWeapon] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:268: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipment[Player.playerWeapon] = flagId; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:269: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipmentN[Player.playerWeapon] = 1; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:270: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.getItems().updateSlot(Player.playerWeapon); ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:297: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipment[Player.playerWeapon] = -1; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:298: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipmentN[Player.playerWeapon] = 0; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:318: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context if (player.playerEquipment[Player.playerWeapon] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:330: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context if (player.playerEquipment[Player.playerWeapon] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:549: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cwGames location: class server.model.players.Client player.cwGames++; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:554: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cwKills location: class server.model.players.Client + player.cwKills + " Deaths: " + c.cwDeaths ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:554: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.minigames.CastleWars + player.cwKills + " Deaths: " + c.cwDeaths ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:555: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cwGames location: class server.model.players.Client + " Games Played: " + player.cw Games + "."); ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:629: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cwKills location: class server.model.players.Client + player.cwKills + " Deaths: " + player.cwDeaths ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:629: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cwDeaths location: class server.model.players.Client + player.cwKills + " Deaths: " + player.cwDeaths ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:661: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.getItems().updateSlot(Player.playerWeapon); ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:673: non-static variable playerCape c annot be referenced from a static context player.getItems().updateSlot(Player.playerCape); ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:745: non-static variable playerCape c annot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipment[Player.playerCape] = capeId; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:746: non-static variable playerCape c annot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipmentN[Player.playerCape] = 1; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:747: non-static variable playerCape c annot be referenced from a static context player.getItems().updateSlot(Player.playerCape); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 23 errors Press any key to continue . . .

How do I make my method non-static?
